articles.description: City will be without their two senior goalkeepers when Barnsley visit the MKM Stadium on Tuesday evening
articles.content: Shota Arveladze says Hull City are considering making a move for goalkeeping cover as the Tigers face up to a crisis ahead of Tuesday nights crunch clash with Yorkshire rivals Barnsley at the MKM Sta… [+2006 chars]

articles.title: Portsmouth dealt major blow as injury sees key ex-Wolves, Wigan Athletic and Derby County man Michael Jacobs sidelined - Portsmouth News
articles.description: Pompey have been handed an injury setback with talisman Michael Jacobs facing a stint on the sidelines.
articles.content:
The key attacking man has been dealt a spell in the treatment room after picking up a knee injury in training last week.
